thread.title: UPS to hire nearly 1,600 in Toledo and Cleveland
thread.title_full: UPS to hire nearly 1,600 in Toledo and Cleveland

author: 13abc
title: UPS to hire nearly 1,600 in Toledo and Cleveland
text:
Cropped Photo: MGN / MGN
Related Links UPS Employment It used to ask" What Can Brown do for You?" But now UPS is looking for a little help of it's own.
The package delivery service says it will hire nearly 1,600 people in the Toledo and Cleveland areas.
Some are seasonal positions, but others are permanent jobs. Openings include package handlers, delivery and tractor-trailer drivers, and driver-helpers.
